articles.description: Apple's new MacBook Air has made its Geekbench debut. It appears to be a base variant based on its 16 GB RAM and slightly lower Metal score, which suggests it might be running an 8-core GPU.

articles.title: Scientists Just Discovered a Hidden Superpower in Microscopes – Thanks to AI - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Traditional microscopy often relies on labeling samples with dyes, but this process is costly and time-consuming. To overcome these limitations, researchers have developed a computational quantitative phase imaging (QPI) method using chromatic aberration and …
